title: Computer-Based Material Design and Development Training for Language Instructors

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Non-degree program conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments. Requires flexible learning structures that allow working professionals to balance job responsibilities

learning_goals: Explain the basic design process of computer-based learning materials aligned with language education objectives
Create simple digital educational content (quizzes, flashcards, etc.) using mobile-friendly tools
Develop interactive HTML/CSS-based educational materials utilizing fundamental programming concepts (loops, conditional statements, etc.)
Complete one computer-based resource applicable to actual language instruction through project-based assessment

resources: Smartphone-Compatible Authoring Tools (Canva, Google Sites, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
